org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.groups

Class SongsGroupsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.commons.controller.custom.InstantiableReinitializableSplitControllerView
      • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.groups.SongsGroupsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloseableControllerHandler, InstantiableController, InstantiableControllerView, InstantiableReinitializableControllerView, Reinitializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlbumsController, ArtistsController, GenresController, YearsController

    public abstract class SongsGroupsController
extends InstantiableReinitializableSplitControllerView
implements CloseableControllerHandler
    Represents a controller that aggregate a list of songs by a field (which must be provided by the entities that inherit from this class) and shows the aggregated items, one for each different value of the aggregation field.

    Furthermore the controller shows the set of songs aggregated for each item (by clicking it).

      • createSongsGroupController

        protected SongsGroupSongsController createSongsGroupController(javafx.scene.image.Image cover,
                                                               java.lang.String itemName,
                                                               java.util.List<Song> songs)
        Returns the controller that is responsible for handle the list of song for a given group of songs.

        The default and base controller responsible for the task is SongsGroupSongsController, but entities that inherit from this one may consider to override the method in order to handle the list of songs in an advanced way.

        Parameters:
        cover - the image associated with the group of songs
        itemName - the name of the group of songs
        songs - the song list of the group of songs
        Returns:
        a new controller that handles the group of songs

      • getSongsGroupImage

        protected javafx.scene.image.Image getSongsGroupImage(java.util.List<Song> songs)
        Returns an image for a list of song.

        This method actually returns the first valid image between the songs of the list.

        Parameters:
        songs - the list of songs from which extract an image
        Returns:
        an Image for the given song list

      • getGroupingField

        protected abstract java.lang.String getGroupingField(Song song)
        Returns the value of the aggregation field for which the songs are grouped by for a given song.

        For instance, if the songs have to be grouped by the artist, the implementation of this method should be Song.getArtist().

        Parameters:
        song - a song
        Returns:
        the value of the aggregation field for the given song

      • createSongsGroupsMap

        private java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Song>> createSongsGroupsMap()
        Creates a map that group each song by the value of the aggregation field provided by getGroupingField(Song).

        The returned map thus maps a string, which is the value of the aggregation field, with the list of songs that has that particular value as aggregation field.

        For instance, if the aggregation field is the artist of the song, the maps contains an entry for each artist that is mapped to the list of songs for that particular artist.

        Returns:
        a map between aggregation fields and their songs lists
